comment: Decent everyday bourbon. Nothing special. Best with ice.
Solid all around bourbon. Mild bite, doesn't linger. Great sipper and great in cocktails.
Nice sweetness, little burn or alcohol taste.

Totally incredible. Sweet  smooth, dangerously tasteful. Vanilla and caramel all around. Finish is short but doesnt matter. This is a must have for everyone who likes Whisky. Hard is not to get addicted.
Sweet. Wow it’s sweet. If that’s your thing than, for the price, it’s the best there is.
Strong first sip and refreshingly smoother as you continue. Drank neat with 2 drops of water to open it up a bit. Doesn’t disappoint at the price point.
Delightful Carmel notes and surprisingly little burn for 45%
For the price you can’t beat it.
Bit of oak, some vanilla and caramel, sweet and smooth. Very pleasing and even more so at this price point

Too sweet for my tastes, with a bit too much ethanol taste. But with more spice than the flavor profile lead me to believe.
Not as good as Weller or MMCS, but a  decent wheated bourbon. 
Better than Larceny 
It's a good bourbon for later in the evening, bit of ice.
Vanilla and cherry, like Cherry Garcia ice cream.
It’s a whisky, it’s fine, nothing to write home about. Opens up decent
Smooth, yet a staple. Classic tasting bourbon.
Nothing too exciting, but is a good classic tasting bourbon in my opinion. I wish it would be a little fuller. All in all it has a good neutral flavor and I imagine it will go well in cocktails.
Vanilla, oak, cinnamon, sweet and light. Daily drinker.

Sweet smell with a hit of alcohol on the aroma...first taste I couldn’t believe how smooth it was with a spicy quick bite.  I do get the taste of caramel.  I’m still very new to this whiskey thing and still learning but I do think for a beginner this is very easy to drink.
Delicious and warm. Vanilla, caramel, spice. Not smoky or peppery. Go to whiskey. Amazing neat, rocks, or old fashioned.
I’m about a year in on drinking bourbon and this is my favorite bottle thus far. The price is incredible for the quality you’re getting. Do yourself a favor and pick up a bottle, you won’t regret it.
Way too easy to drink. Very smooth, sweet, and with a great finish that leaves you wanting for more
Very very similar to weller SR. Maybe slightly more creamy vanilla
